columns.description: The simulation of complex systems in natural science or engineering depends on the development of adequate mathematical models. Thus the development of realistic and yet efficient models is one of our core activities.

href.Description: The simulation of complex systems in natural science or engineering depends on the development of adequate mathematical models. Thus the development of realistic and yet efficient models is one of our core activities.
href.Title: Modelling and Simulation
href.title: Modelling and Simulation

columns.title: Modelling and Simulation

columns.description: There is a broad class of algorithms and methods that are common to several scientific or engineering problems. Ideally, the development of simulation programs follows a layered design in which generic methods are applied to create or extend domain-specific solutions.

href.Description: There is a broad class of algorithms and methods that are common to several scientific or engineering problems. Ideally, the development of simulation programs follows a layered design in which generic methods are applied to create or extend domain-specific solutions.
href.Title: Algorithms and Methods
href.title: Algorithms and Methods

columns.title: Algorithms and Methods

columns.description: Through research on resource and data management, workflows, virtualisation, and security we foster the easy and secure access to distributed systems and data that builds the foundation for the exploitation of results across scientific domains.

href.Description: Through research on resource and data management, workflows, virtualisation, and security we foster the easy and secure access to distributed systems and data that builds the foundation for the exploitation of results across scientific domains.
href.Title: Distributed Computing
href.title: Distributed Computing

columns.title: Distributed Computing
